item.title: Linear Equations
item.description: Linear Equations # Example A # \[x + 2y = 5\] \[3x + 4y = 6\] \[A = \begin{pmatrix} 1 & 2 \\ 4 & 3 \end{pmatrix} \quad b = \begin{pmatrix} 5 \\ 6 \end{pmatrix}\] \[x = A^{-1} \cdot b\]
